text: (ai rasool) kuphfaar (makka) tumase kahate hain ki agar ham tumhaare saath deen haq kee pairavee karen to ham apane mulq se uchak lie jaen (ye kya bakate hai) kya hamane unhen haram (makka) mein jahaan har tarah ka aman hai jagah nahin dee vahaan har kism ke phal rozee ke vaaste hamaaree baaragaah se khinche chale jaate hain magar bahutere log nahin jaate
